name: Mason and Strings (itch)
description:
Press Enter to Start!

Controls (keyboard):

AD to move

Spacebar to jump and continue text

Left Click to use grapple hook (use the mouse to aim)

W to interact

E to play guitar

WS to move chord wheel

Left Arrow (I) to play C

Up Arrow (K) to play G

Right Arrow (M) to play D and to skip text

Down Arrow (J) to play E-minor

Escape to pause

Credits:

Jack Brubaker - art, story, music

Patrick Merklee - lead programming, level design

Jason Sekora - music

Dalton Hutchinson - programming

Josh Shoenfelt- programming
